targets.query: SELECT (mean("usage_guest") + mean("usage_guest_nice") + mean("usage_iowait") +  mean("usage_irq") + mean("usage_nice") +  mean("usage_softirq") + mean("usage_steal") + mean("usage_system") + mean("usage_user") ) AS "usage" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname[.]?/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu", "host" fill(null)
